Parameter.name: userRules
Parameter.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><rules version="1.0"> <default colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture"/> <FilePathRule name="hdr" extension="*" pattern="*hdr*" colorSpace="Utility - Linear - sRGB" /> <FilePathRule name="Normal" extension="*" pattern="*Normal*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="Displacement" extension="*" pattern="*Displacement*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="Roughness" extension="*" pattern="*Roughness*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="Opacity" extension="*" pattern="*Opacity*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="Bump" extension="*" pattern="*Bump*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /> <FilePathRule name="Gloss" extension="*" pattern="*Gloss*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /></rules>
